channel.title: Quick skillcape I made for a specific site's server, just to show it
channel.description: Well I'm making a new client and server for a site, I won't mention which site, but its fairly popular. Anyways, I am making costom site armor, and this is one of the skillcapes I made. My first edited item, took like 15 minutes, will release if every1 likes it enough... No big deal really though, just looking to see if every1 else thinks it turned out nicely... [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/10576ee[/img]

item.title: Quick skillcape I made for a specific site's server, just to show it
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“king gauge, post:12, topic:243866”][quote author=IP link=topic=320214.msg2535804#msg2535804 date=1226728082]
Nice I guess, could be cool if you wanted to make an A, C, M, and O capes for Administrators, Co owners, Moderators, and Owners :P.
[/quote] lol good idea i might ‘borrow’ it. Maybe for capes or something else idk yet lol thank you!

And it is just a recolored skillcape with new icon but still nice =P

lol i need to add skillcapes to my server still, and make it so you can’t wear them unless you’re 99 in that skill.[/quote]

do you NOT see the age of this topic? 90% says this guy will NEVER reply to you unless through a pm, and thats what you do. Your post was almost as bad as a gravedig.

Read full topic
